name: Main Street & Hubbard Track Junction
description: The dusty intersection of Main Street and Hubbard Track, a central hub of activity in nascent Hill Valley. You are at the crossroads of Main Street and Hubbard Track, a place where the past and present seem to converge with the distant creak of wagon wheels. Main Street continues its rough-hewn journey to the west, a path of nascent commerce. Hubbard Track stretches to the south, disappearing into the dusty plains. The imposing clock tower, still under construction but already a landmark, looms in the distance, its unfinished face a silent promise of future punctuality. To the east, a rough-hewn meeting hall, serving as the town's social and spiritual center, stands as a testament to pioneer resolve.
